SocialMediaPosting.headline: Mrs. Lauren Werner’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope we inspire future leaders to advocate for individuals with disabilities and foster change…”

– Mrs. Lauren Werner, High School English Educator @HopewellASD @pointparku @DUSchoolofEd @wjcollege https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/inspire-future-leaders-advocate-individuals-disabilities/
